tool_description: Logs and retrieves notification history for audit purposes, compliance reporting, and customer service inquiries.

start_date.description: Start date for history retrieval (date-time format)

end_date.description: End date for history retrieval (date-time format)

channel_filter.description: Filter by channel: email, sms, push, or all

max_records.description: Maximum number of records to return (1-1000)

error_messages: Customer not found: The provided customer_id does not exist in the system.
Invalid date range: start_date must be before end_date and both must be valid date-time strings.
Invalid channel filter: channel_filter must be one of: email, sms, push, all.
Invalid max_records: max_records must be between 1 and 1000.
usage: Provide customer_id to get notification history. Optionally filter by date range, channel, and limit the number of records returned.

total_records.description: Total number of notification records found

returned_records.description: Number of records returned in this response

notifications.description: Array of notification records with timestamp, type, channel, and status
